findings.title: RSW - Redundant Storage Writes
findings.description: The contract updates the `liquidityPools` of an address even if its current state is the same as the one passed as an argument, resulting in redundant storage writes.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: The contract declares state variables that their value is initialized once in the constructor and are not modified afterwards.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The Solidity style guide provides guidelines for writing clean and consistent Solidity code, including naming conventions for functions, variables, contracts, structs, enums, and constants. Adhering to these conventions can improve the readability and maintainability of the code.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.
